column4: Hey guys, I have just got give a VIrtual System running Ubuntu 8.04 server, whenever I run apt-get I get the following errors: http://paste.stoned-hacker.co.uk/29 they are locale issues, and locale is installed.. any ideas ?
No ideas it was given to me on a VPS system (e.g. openvz and I got give root login to the guest).
